pr_title: Remove default priority method impl from SecurityIdentityAugmentor examples

timeline.bodyText: Higher priorities will be invoked first? It would be nice to make that explicit too
timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -150,6 +140,12 @@ public class RolesAugmentor implements SecurityIdentityAugmentor {
 }
 ----
 
+[NOTE]
+===
+If more than one custom `SecurityIdentityAugmentor` is registered then they will be considered equal candidates and called in random order.
+You can enforce the call order by implementing a default `SecurityIdentityAugmentor#priority` method.

replies.bodyText: @gastaldi Hi George, how does it read now ?
replies.author: sberyozkin

timeline.message: Remove default priority method impl from SecurityIdentityAugmentor examples
Remove default priority method impl from SecurityIdentityAugmentor examples
